## PolicySourceGit interface

Policies sourced from a Git repository using the [\`git\` storage driver](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/configuration/storage.html#git-driver)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PolicySourceGit 
```
